name: Sthefanny Gonzaga
aboutMeDescription: I am a full stack developer with 10 years of experience, that being 10 with javascript and 8 with C#. I have knowledge in some front end and back end languages, responsive frameworks and best code practices. Currently, my main focus is development with Flutter, I have been working with this technology since Jul/2019.
autoCeabsDescription:
É um aplicativo para controlar seu veículo o tempo todo.

 Com ele é possível:
- Visualizar em tempo real onde está seu veículo;
- Traçar rota entre seu celular e o veículo (ideal para quem vive esquecendo onde estacionou);
- Visualizar dados estatísticos de uso do veículo, como km rodado na semana, fim de semana, horário comercial, fora do horário comercial entre outros.
- Criar uma cerca virtual onde está estacionado seu veículo. Caso ele saia da cerca você será avisado em tempo real (ideal para quem deixa o carro estacionado em vias públicas ou em valet parking).


It was the first app I developed. The Auto Ceabs already existed, it was first developed with native languages, and I had the opportunity to develop it with Flutter. I had no knowledge, so I could study and deploy it to the stores. At that time the ratings went from 1.1 to 3.7.
arduinoDescription: It was a project made in live with my husband. He did the arduíno part, creating an API. I developed an app with Flutter to consume API and can turn RGB lights on and off.
pokedexDescription: It was a project made in live building a Pokedex, which is a Pokemon list.
patienceDescription: It was a project made in live to create the card game called Patience. A public API was used. It's still being developed.
